description: Cross-project learning from QA failures. Updated after each research project.

failure_patterns.description: Dropping qualifiers when citing statistics (up to, approximately, under conditions)
failure_patterns.prevention_rule: Always preserve qualifiers: 'up to', 'approximately', 'under X conditions', 'in Y contexts'

failure_patterns.description: News articles citing same press release counted as independent sources
failure_patterns.prevention_rule: For breaking news, trace all articles to original source before counting independence

failure_patterns.description: Mixing fiscal year and calendar year data without noting discrepancy
failure_patterns.prevention_rule: Always note FY vs CY; normalize to consistent timeframe or flag explicitly

failure_patterns.description: Using outdated data for 'current state' claims
failure_patterns.prevention_rule: Verify publication date; flag if >12 months old for fast-moving topics

failure_patterns.description: Using definitive language without strong evidence (clearly, proves, definitely)
failure_patterns.prevention_rule: Flag definitive language for evidence strength check; prefer 'suggests', 'indicates'

prevention_checklist: Preserve all statistical qualifiers (up to, approximately, under conditions)
Trace news articles to original source for independence check
Verify fiscal year vs calendar year alignment
Match units when combining multi-source data
Flag definitive language (clearly, proves, definitely) for evidence check
Verify claim confidence matches evidence strength
